div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1071 Staro-Nizhne-Steblievskaia environs, Krasnoarmeisk raion, Krasnodar Territory, RSFSR, 1943 Burial: c. 300-275 B.C. Contents: c. 200 AE Panticapaeum: AE Disposition: Gelendzhik (Gelendzhik Raion Regional Mus.) 4 (as BMC 23) Pakhomov VIII, 1904 Possibly from the same hd. as no. 1072
